original_text: And so it was at the beginning of their dwelling there, that they feared not the Lord: therefore the Lord sent lions among them, which slew some of them.
korean_text: 그들이 처음으로 거기 거주할 때에 여호와를 경외하지 아니하므로 여호와께서 사자들을 그들 가운데에 보내시매 몇 사람을 죽인지라

sentences.original_text: And so it was at the beginning
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 그들이 처음 거주하기 시작했을 때

sentences.original_text: that they feared not the Lord:
therefore the Lord sent lions among them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주께서 그들 가운데 사자들을 보내시니,
